entries.name: each_recursive()
entries.desc: Visit all subnodes of self recursively

entries.name: find_first_recursive()
entries.desc: Find (and return) first subnode (recursively) for which the block evaluates to true. Returns nil if none was found.

entries.name: index_in_parent()
entries.desc: Returns the position that self holds in its parent's array, indexed from 1.

entries.name: to_s(indent=nil)
entries.desc: DEPRECATED This parameter is now ignored.  See the formatters in the REXML::Formatters package for changing the output style.
